name: MC::Header
info: Head bank for the generated event

name: MC::Event
info: Lund header bank for the generated event

entries.name: npart
entries.info: number of particles in the event (User Defined)

entries.name: atarget
entries.info: Mass number of the target (User Defined)

entries.name: ztarget
entries.info: Atomic number oif the target (User Defined)

entries.name: daughter
entries.info: index of the first daughter (User Defined)

entries.name: pid
entries.info: ID of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

entries.name: mpid
entries.info: ID of the mother of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

entries.name: tid
entries.info: Track ID of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

entries.name: mtid
entries.info: Track ID of the mother of the first particle entering the sensitive volume

entries.name: otid
entries.info: Track ID of the original track that generated the first particle entering the sensitive volume

entries.name: avgX
entries.info: Average X position in global reference system

entries.name: avgY
entries.info: Average Y position in global reference system

entries.name: avgZ
entries.info: Average Z position in global reference system

entries.name: avgLx
entries.info: Average X position in local reference system

entries.name: avgLy
entries.info: Average Y position in local reference system

entries.name: avgLz
entries.info: Average Z position in local reference system

entries.name: px
entries.info: x component of momentum of the particle entering the sensitive volume

entries.name: py
entries.info: y component of momentum of the particle entering the sensitive volume

entries.name: pz
entries.info: z component of momentum of the particle entering the sensitive volume

entries.name: vx
entries.info: x component of primary vertex of the particle entering the sensitive volume

entries.name: vy
entries.info: y component of primary vertex of the particle entering the sensitive volume

entries.name: vz
entries.info: z component of primary vertex of the particle entering the sensitive volume

entries.name: mvx
entries.info: x component of primary vertex of the mother of the particle entering the sensitive volume

entries.name: mvy
entries.info: y component of primary vertex of the mother of the particle entering the sensitive volume

entries.name: mvz
entries.info: z component of primary vertex of the mother of the particle entering the sensitive volume

entries.name: procID
entries.info: Process that created the FP. see gemc.jlab.org

entries.name: mcTindex
entries.info: MC Particle index, as in tid

entries.name: MCLayersTrk
entries.info: layers of tracker (mostly)  detectors that a given MCParticle hit. Each layer corresponds to a specific bit in this variable

entries.name: MCLayersNeut
entries.info: layers of detectors (non tracker) that a givem MCParticle hit. Each layer corresponds to a specific bit in this variable

entries.name: RecLayersTrk
entries.info: layers of tracker detectors (mostly) that, the matched RecParticle picked hits from

entries.info: layers of detectors (mostly) that, the matched RecParticle picked hits from
